msg: - Now implements SecurityStore and LockStore to remove dependency on other Store implementations.

author: unico
msg: - allow subclasses to overide read content behavior
- add option to configure resource paths to be indexed
- add XMLContentIndexer that indexes only the character data of an xml document

author: luetzkendorf
msg: invalid ranges now throw  WebdavExceptions to avoid IllegalStateEception
while writing to the response after sendError

author: luetzkendorf
msg: added some testcases for partial gets
